name: Mobileweb Company
overview:
Mobileweb Company is a leading global provider of strategic mobile marketing and optimisation services, including the advanced m.Discovery platform.

By working with Mobileweb Company, marketers are empowered to deliver low cost and effective programmes that target and engage mobile consumers at point of need in a totally managed way. Founded in 2010, Mobileweb Company is a rapidly expanding, independent company with a best-in-class technology recognised by leading industry analysts.

Co-founded by Martin Wilson and Damian Stafford to support brands effectively engage customers and deliver real value from mobile. An unrivalled track record and wealth of expertise in mobile, marketing and technology mean the Mobileweb Company really understands what it takes to create a strong brand presence tailored for mobile, support discovery and drive value to a client.

Their ambition is simple. The objective is to provide the right mobile solutions to a client that will deliver the most value. They adopt a no nonsense approach. Their focus is on strategy and excelling in execution.

The mobile marketing solutions are client driven and their values reflect many years of experience. Mobileweb Company will cut through the hype to provide marketing and business solutions that deliver results.
